Urbana, Illinois
Mr. Graydon Ausmus , Director
Station WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Gray don:
I am just back from a brief vacation and beginning to
clear away the mail.
Many thanks for your August 15th letter in the Atomic
Energy Commission and Chester Heslep. He has written Hovik
about the fall meeting, and I certainly hope he can attend.
I believe your suggestions are very much to the point,
and this is a relationship we should further foster.
I think the Allerton House experience this year was
again very stimulating, and I am particularly glad of our
conversation; I think it cleared up many points. I apprec¬
iate your comments about the network memorandum. I am
anxious to have your comments on this at Lexington.
Best wishes.
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
President
RBH/sc
Representing non-commercial, educational AM, FM, and TV radio stations, workshops, and production centers,
owned and operated by schools, colleges, universities, and public-service agencies.
